\n 1. Log in to Xero.\n 2. Go to [Deve:
1. Log in op Xero.
  2. Ga naar [Developer portal](https://developer.xero.com/app/manage/).
  3. Klik op de App die je wilt integreren.
  4. Klik links op `Configuration`.
  5. Voer je `redirect url` in.
  6. Kopieer de `Client Id` en `Client Secret`.
